#summary A model theory of primordial forces as described in the Zhou Yi
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

The [http://metacognition.info/owl/yijing.owl ontology] documents a set of first-order constants interpreted as elements of a set of primordial forces defined by axioms on the (Zhou Yi) symbols which are written characters with a structural form that 'illustrate' the forces underlying all natural phenomena ( as purported and described by the authors of the text ).

== Rules ==

Accompanying rules as RIF human readable syntax

{{{
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:sixthLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:firstLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:fifthLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:secondLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:fourthLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:thirdLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:thirdLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:fourthLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:secondLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:fifthLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?INVERSE ?YAO ( iching:firstLine(?INVERSE ?YAO) :- And( iching:inverse(?GUA ?INVERSE) iching:sixthLine(?GUA ?YAO) ) )
Forall ?GUA ?OTHER ( iching:inverse(?OTHER ?GUA) :- iching:inverse(?GUA ?OTHER) )
Forall ?UPPER ?LOWER ?GUA ?GUA2 ?GUA1 ( Exists _:hKrlctKJ135 ( And( iching:NonInvertibleGua(hKrlctKJ135) iching:NonInvertibleGua(?GUA2) ) ) :- And( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA1 ?LOWER) iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA1 ?UPPER) iching:inverse(?GUA1 ?GUA2) iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA2 ?LOWER) iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA2 ?UPPER) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Heaven) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Earth) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Water) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Wind) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Thunder) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Fire) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Lake) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:lowerPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Mountain) :- And( iching:firstLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:secondLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:thirdLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Heaven) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Mountain) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Earth) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Water) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Wind) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Thunder) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Fire) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) ) )
Forall ?GUA ( iching:upperPrimaryGua(?GUA huang:Lake) :- And( iching:fourthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:fifthLine(?GUA iching:Yang) iching:sixthLine(?GUA iching:Yin) ) )

}}}

== Summary of Classes (in Manchester OWL)  ==

{{{
Class: NonInvertibleGua 
    ## Primitive Type (Vertically symmetric gua) ##
    SubClassOf: Hexagram / gua
Class: NaturalPhenomenon 
    ## Primitive Type (Natural phenomenon) ##
    The fundamental natural phenomena signified by the images / signs in the YiJing
    SubClassOf: ns3:RealizableEntity
Class: InvertibleGua 
    ## Primitive Type (Paired gua) ##
    SubClassOf: ( 'inverse gua' SOME ( NOT Vertically symmetric gua ) )
                Hexagram / gua . 
    DisjointWith Vertically symmetric gua

Class: PrimaryEnergySymbol 
    ## Primitive Type (Symbol for Primary energy) ##
    SubClassOf: Symbol
Class: ChangeSymbol 
    ## Primitive Type (Symbol) ##
    The images set forth by the sages (FuXi and King Wen) that signify natural phenomena
    SubClassOf: ( obo:IAO_0000136 SOME Natural phenomenon )
                obo:IAO_0000030
Class: PrimaryGua 
    ## Primitive Type (Trigram) ##
    SubClassOf: ( foaf:maker VALUE dbpedia:Fu_X> )
                Symbol
Class: yijing:AccomplishedGua 
    ## A Defined Class (Hexagram / gua) ##
    SubClassOf: ( 'King Wen order' SOME ns2:integer )
                Symbol
                ( foaf:maker VALUE dbpedia:King_Wen_of_Zhou> )
                ( ( lowerPrimaryGua SOME Trigram ) AND 
                  ( upperPrimaryGua SOME Trigram ) ) . 
    EquivalentTo: ( ( firstLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) AND 
                            ( secondLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) AND 
                            ( thirdLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) AND 
                            ( fourthLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) AND 
                            ( fifthLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) AND 
                            ( sixthLine SOME Symbol for Primary energy ) )
}}}
